extendedInfo.description: âââââ  First review by Androidpit: ââ¦ a fun game with an easy, simple gameplay and best of all it's challenging and somewhat addictive.â âââââ BraveSmart is the most addictive puzzle game youâll ever play. Youâll pick it up in a second â and wonât be able to put it down for hours.â¢ Combine three wood, metal or rock tiles to build a cottage, three cottages for a mansion, right up to majestic castles.â¢ Outfox the sheep to make the most of your space, and make sure you donât get boxed in behind treacherous rocks.Play BraveSmart now!StoryScotland, the beginning of the Middle Ages. For long years, the Clans have hidden from the Sidhe, the mythical creatures of legend. But now, the dark ages are past and the bright modern Middle Age has set in. Three brave Clans have taken to resettle the deserted Highlands. But, alas, Clan Woodhead, Clan Tinears and Clan Stonehands canât decide on a common course of action and hinder each otherâs efforts. Also, the sheep are quite enjoying the freedom on the unsettled land and might move against them.The Clans look for a Hero to unite them. Failing that theyâd settle for a man with good organizational skills.You are that man, called the âBraveSmartâ for your brains and willingness to deal with the stubborn Clansmen.Go forth, resettle the Highlands! (But watch out for the sheep.)

reviews.title: Way cool and so much fun!
reviews.comment: Excellent  A great way to spend some time.
reviews.author: Suzanne Sams

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Do you really would cuddle a sheep? Awesome game, awesome graphic and awesome sounds. Thank you!

reviews.title: Restart level dialog
reviews.comment: Game is great, especially cows! I would really like to see \'yes\' option in dialog when restating the level on the right, at least for android 4.0+ when that became a standard :p.
reviews.author: aya moo

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: This game is fun... addicting. Ads aren\'t a problem, doesn\'t freeze, doesn\'t bother my phone, can stop playing whenever u want. Jus wish I knew that all the extra tools u get don\'t come back after u use em :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game..
reviews.comment: Lots of time wasting fun.. some are really tricky... Go back a few levels & get your coins back then try try again...
reviews.author: Karin Randall

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: I wish there we\'re more games like this, any concept will do....please make some!!! Great to play for hours, or real quick between work meetings.
reviews.author: april helmer

reviews.title: Never boring, even when I play the same level over
reviews.comment: Engaging puzzle game that keeps me coming back. The concept is fun and the graphics & sound effects are adorable.
reviews.author: Morgan Bondelid

reviews.title: Looking to waste some time????
reviews.comment: Then this is your game! Usually have no trouble backing away from a game, but not this one.  Have lost many hours of sleep with it and find myself replaying tougher levels in my head while doing other things. If you enjoy being a productive person, I suggest you steer clear of Bravesmart!
reviews.author: Stephanie Banner

reviews.title: Brave smart
reviews.comment: Great game to play while waiting for an appointment
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent love it
reviews.comment: What a headache but fun hard to build to ranches enjoy it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!!!
reviews.comment: Simple and addictive, really need to use ur brain =p
reviews.author: Muhamad Hamijuwain

reviews.title: Cuddle that sheep!
reviews.comment: This is a great game. I honestly didn\'t realize it was a match three until much after playing it for a while. I downloaded it without reading the description because I so enjoyed one of their other games, I figured I\'d try all of them. I was actually surprised to find it was a match 3 (though how I missed that is beyond me!) as I get bored very quickly by them. Great game by a great company!
reviews.author: Crystal Jeffs

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: By far the most entertaining game.  I can say it is best game ever, even my wife who does not games really enjoyed BraveSmart. Eagerly looking for more levels.
reviews.author: Behdaad D

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: One of the best done themes I have come across lately! It greatly enhances the puzzles!
reviews.author: Olga Miletich

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great game, very addictive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: 5 star game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game If It Didn\'t Crash All The Time.
reviews.comment: I really like this game, its cute, addictive and fun.  BUT I would give it a higher rating if it didn\'t crash after every level. Very frustrating!
reviews.author: Judi T

reviews.title: Stupidly addictive
reviews.comment: If u need to get anything done, then don\'t download this! I found an hour of my life slip away as i was determined to complete a level! Its a good problem solving game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Great game. Try it you\'ll like it
reviews.author: A Google User
